mapper.sql: ZID, ZNAME, PJOB, ZDEPT, PATENTNAME, ZTYPE, ZRANID, ZSTATE, ZNUM, ZDATE, ZAWARD, ZOTHERS, ZSCORE, ZREMARKS, ZSECOND, ZTHIRD, ZACHNUM, ZMEMBERS,KYID,ZRESOURCE
mapper.select: select ZACHNUM from K_PATENT where ZID = #{zid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ZRESOURCE from K_PATENT where ZID = #{zid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

and KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
